name: Vereniging van Grootwinkelbedrijven in Textiel
goal: Doel van de VGT is het behartigen van de economische en sociale belangen van haar leden.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Supply chain transparancy, due diligence legislation, microplastics, packaging, textiles, trade and CSR.
